title: Your Voice, Our Contract: Bargaining Survey Update
description: An update from the bargaining committee on the contract survey and the importance of member participation.

title: Bowling Night Was a Striking Success!
description: A fun-filled bowling night brought our union members together for an evening of strikes, spares, and solidarity.

title: Ice Cream Social Was Sweet!
description: Thank you to all the members, family, and friends who joined us for our Solidarity Ice Cream Party outside the Kerr Administration building!
